content.query:
SELECT count(1)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'silver/trip_data_green/year=2020/month=02/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'parquet'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT count(1)
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
                BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=02/*.csv',
                DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_src',
                FORMAT = 'CSV',
                HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
                PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
            ) AS [result]
